name: Federatie Nederlandse Levensmiddelen Industrie
membership: FNLI is a member of FoodDrinkEurope and AIM (European Brands Association)
goal: The FNLI represents the interests of the Dutch Food and Drink Industries in The Netherlands and in the European Union.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Taxation
euInitiatives:
EU Circular Economy Package, Food Wastage
Country of Origin Labelling
Unfair Trading Practices in the Food Supply Chain
